original_title: ほんとにあった！呪いのビデオ64
overview: A video of the author's man stopping by a certain ruin with his friends while driving. While the contributors are exploring the ruins, you can hear a loud noise from the upper floor. After that, I went up to the upper floor, and when I entered a room, I found a doll wearing charred clothes falling in the room. After that, things in the room float in the air by themselves and fall ....
title: Honto Ni Atta! Noroi No Video 64
